meanings.definition: A declaration or assurance that one will do a particular thing or that a particular thing will happen.
meanings.sent1: Her promise to help with the project was greatly appreciated.
meanings.sent2: The promise of a bright future kept him going during tough times.
meanings.sent3: The promise of free ice cream made everyone excited for the event.
meanings.sent4: The promise of a new beginning filled her with hope.
meanings.sent5: His promise to always be there for her never wavered.

meanings.definition: Assure someone that one will definitely do, give, or arrange something; undertake or declare that something will happen.
meanings.sent1: She promised to return the book to the library on time.
meanings.sent2: He promised to call his friend after school.
meanings.sent3: The magician promised to make the rabbit disappear, but it ended up hiding in his hat.
meanings.sent4: The sun promised a beautiful day ahead with its warm rays.
meanings.sent5: The clock promised that it was time to go home with its loud chime.
